snippet: Nicolas Batum had 16 points, 13 rebounds and eight assists, providing a spark during a big third quarter that carried the Charlotte Hornets to a 91-82 victory over the Miami Heat on Thursday night....
lead_paragraph: Nicolas Batum had 16 points, 13 rebounds and eight assists, providing a spark during a big third quarter that carried the Charlotte Hornets to a 91-82 victory over the Miami Heat on Thursday night.

headline.main: Third-Quarter Dominance Leads Hornets Past Heat, 91-82
headline.print_headline: Third-Quarter Dominance Leads Hornets Past Heat, 91-82
